home.subtitleSignedOut: Sign in to start your daily brain exercises.

auth.successDescription: Please check your inbox to confirm your email.

settings.title: Settings
settings.currentTheme: You are currently using the {{mode}} theme.

feedback.incorrect: Try again, focus on the hint.

memoryMatch.title: Memory Match
memoryMatch.summary: Flip the cards and find the matching pairs.
memoryMatch.goal: Find all pairs as fast as possible.
memoryMatch.hint: Memorize the corners first to speed up.
memoryMatch.explanation: Use your short-term memory to spot the pair.

sequenceRemember.title: Sequence Recall
sequenceRemember.summary: Repeat the color sequence in order.
sequenceRemember.goal: Remember the sequence as it grows each round.
sequenceRemember.explanation: Follow the rhythm to keep the order.

patternVision.title: Pattern Finder
patternVision.summary: Identify the missing element in the pattern.
patternVision.goal: Reach the highest number of correct answers.
patternVision.hint: Look for how the shapes increase or decrease.
patternVision.explanation: Track the rate of increase to find the next number.

quickCount.title: Quick Count
quickCount.summary: Count the objects quickly before time runs out.
quickCount.goal: Choose the correct number before the timer ends.
quickCount.hint: Group the items to count faster.
quickCount.prompt: How many symbols do you see? {{symbols}}
quickCount.explanation: Grouping helps estimate and verify faster.

focusTap.title: Focus Tap
focusTap.summary: Tap the targets as soon as they appear.
focusTap.goal: Hit as many targets as possible in time.
focusTap.hint: Keep your eyes near the center.
focusTap.prompt: Focus on the target number: {{number}}. Which option is correct?
focusTap.explanation: Stay centered and maintain your focus.

emotionMatch.title: Emotion Match
emotionMatch.summary: Match facial expressions to the correct emotion.
emotionMatch.goal: Match accurately with a high success rate.
emotionMatch.hint: Watch the eyes and mouth for clues.
emotionMatch.prompt: Which emotion does this face show? {{emoji}}
emotionMatch.explanation: Eyes and mouth reveal the emotion.

rhythmTap.title: Rhythm Tap
rhythmTap.summary: Follow the rhythm and tap in time.

mathBridge.title: Number Bridge
mathBridge.summary: Complete the bridge with simple math.
mathBridge.goal: Solve the operations correctly to cross.
mathBridge.hint: Break large numbers into smaller parts.
mathBridge.explanation: Split the numbers mentally for quick sums.

findTheDifference.title: Spot the Difference
findTheDifference.summary: Find the differences between two visuals.
findTheDifference.goal: Spot all differences before time runs out.
findTheDifference.hint: Scan the scene in a Z pattern.
findTheDifference.explanation: Choose the flower with the different color.
